snippet: Jeff Gordon will race for a fifth Cup championship in his final Nascar season, in large part because Matt Kenseth knocked out both of Roger Penske’s cars before Gordon won the Goody’s Headache Relief Shot 500 at Martinsville Speedway in Virginia.
abstract: Jeff Gordon wins Goody's Headache Relief Shot 500 auto race to clinch spot in Chase for Sprint Cup championship; other racing news noted.
lead_paragraph: Jeff Gordon will race for a fifth Cup championship in his final Nascar season, in large part because Matt Kenseth knocked out both of Roger Penske’s cars before Gordon won the Goody’s Headache Relief Shot 500 at Martinsville Speedway in Virginia.

headline.main: Gordon Stays in the Hunt for a Championship
headline.print_headline: Gordon Stays in the Hunt for a Championship

keywords.value: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
